data.description: The initial layer line width is set as a percentage of all lines printed on the initial layer.
data.img_description: The model on the left has a 100% initial line width, the image on the right has a 135% initial line width.
data.hints:
- This setting affects all line widths; skin, walls, adhesion, support and the prime tower. The factor is multiplied to whatever the line widths of these individual settings are.
- The slightly increased initial layer line width improves adhesion to the build plate.
